Package dao

Class Dao

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.Dao
  • public class Dao
extends java.lang.Object
    Date: 19.4.2022 This is the DAO class that is responsible for accessing the databases.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arsi Arola, Ari-Jussi Ahonen, Oskari Ahoniemi

      • userAnswerToList

        public java.util.ArrayList<UserAnswer> userAnswerToList​(UserAnswer u)
        This method receives all answers given by the user and puts them into a list. Then the list is returned.
        Parameters:
        u - UserAnswer-object u which holds the answers from the users.
        Returns:
        returning a AraayList-of answers.

      • readAnswersCandidate

        public java.util.HashMap<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object>,​java.lang.Integer> readAnswersCandidate()
        This method was created for testing purposes. It retrieves candidate answers from database and stores them into a HashMap. Finally the HashMap is returned.
        Returns:
        returns map

      • readAnswersCandidate2

        public com.google.common.collect.Table<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> readAnswersCandidate2()
        This method retrieves all answers of candidates from the database. Then it stores the answers into a Guava-table and returns it.
        Returns:
        returning a Guava-table with candidate_id, question_id and answer_id.
